topic.title: How to Display certain Elements as Tabs

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p:
It is possible to display the following elements as tabs in the WebHelp output:
Lists (both ol and ul)
Definition list (dl)
Choice tables (choicetable) For this you just need to add the outputclass="wh-tabbed" attribute on the element.The tab name is extracted from:
The first ph in lists
The first dt in dl
The first choption in choicetable
The output will look like this:Clicking on each tab will open the corresponding content.
